title: Bloomberg Markets: Kennon Says Earnings Driving Market

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Aaron Kennon\u0010CEO\u0010Clear Harbor Asset Management \u0010Discussing his "cautiously optimistic" outlook for the markets.
